price: Dan kaummu mendustakannya (azab)484 padahal azab itu benar adanya. Katakanlah, "Aku ini bukanlah orang yang diserahi mengurus urusanmu".
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ قُل لَّسۡتُ عَلَيۡكُم بِوَكِيلٖ
footnotes: 484.  Sebagian mufasir mengatakan bahwa yang didustakan itu ialah Al-Qur`ān.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa al-ḥaqu qul lastu ʿalaykum biwakīlin
